textContent:
Cross-Social Media.

Centralize all major social media on a single site. Be able to post on all major social media from a single place, be able to view all social media from the same place.

Format issues? Have a converter for all formats. 
Imagine you want to post a facebook post on Twitter: you draft the text, and it becomes an image on twitter (or a regular post if you have twitter blue).
Or else, you want to post a video on instagram: the video gets simultaneously uploaded to all your chosen platforms.
title: Website idea
textContentHtml:
Cross-Social Media.


Centralize all major social media on a single site. Be able to post on all major social media from a single place, be able to view all social media from the same place.


Format issues? Have a converter for all formats. 

Imagine you want to post a facebook post on Twitter: you draft the text, and it becomes an image on twitter (or a regular post if you have twitter blue).

Or else, you want to post a video on instagram: the video gets simultaneously uploaded to all your chosen platforms.
